SELECT PO.PO_ID, PO.PO_NUM, NVL(SUM(PD.PO_COUNT), 0) AS PO_COUNT, TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(PD.TOTAL_PRICE), 0), 'FM9,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999,999') || '원' AS PO_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, C.RESP_NAME,
PO.CLIENT_ID, C.CLIENT_NAME, (SELECT SUB_NAME FROM MES_COMMON WHERE SUB_ID = PO.PO_STATUS AND MAIN_ID = 'STATUS') AS PO_STATUS, TO_CHAR(PO.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, M2.NAME AS UPDATE_MEMBER FROM PURCHASE_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN PO_DETAIL PD ON PO.PO_ID = PD.PO_ID -- 주문 상세 정보 조인 LEFT JOIN MEMBER M1 ON PO.MEMBER_ID = M1.MEMBER_ID -- 주문 생성자 조인 LEFT JOIN CLIENT C ON PO.CLIENT_ID = C.CLIENT_ID -- 거래처 조인 LEFT JOIN MEMBER M2 ON PO.UPDATE_MEMBER = M2.MEMBER_ID -- 수정한 사람 조인 GROUP BY PO.PO_ID, PO.PO_NUM, PO.CREATE_DATE, C.RESP_NAME, PO.CLIENT_ID, C.CLIENT_NAME, PO.PO_STATUS, PO.UPDATE_DATE, M2.NAME ORDER BY PO.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE_ORDER ( PO_ID, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, CLIENT_ID, PO_STATUS, PO_NUM ) SELECT 'PO-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), CURRENT_DATE, RESP_NAME, CLIENT_ID, #{PO_STATUS}, 'ORD-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MMDD-HH24MISS') FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENT_ID = #{CLIENT_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASE_ORDER SET CREATE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE, CLIENT_ID = #{CLIENT_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE, UPDATE_MEMBER = #{UPDATE_MEM}, PO_NUM = #{PO_NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE PO_ID = #{PO_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(pd.PODETAIL_ID)) AS SEQ, -- 숫자 변환 후 정렬 pd.PODETAIL_ID, pd.MATERIAL_ID, TO_CHAR((pd.PO_COUNT * m.MATERIAL_PRICE) * 0.1, 'FM9,999,999,999,999,999,999,999') || '원' AS VAT, TO_CHAR((pd.PO_COUNT * m.MATERIAL_PRICE) * 1.1, 'FM9,999,999,999,999,999,999,999') || '원' AS TOTAL_PRICE, pd.PO_COUNT, pd.TOTAL_PRICE, pd.UPDATE_DATE, pd.UPDATE_MEMBER, m.MATERIAL_NAME, m.UNIT, TO_CHAR(m.MATERIAL_PRICE, 'FM9,999,999,999,999,999,999,999') || '원' AS MATERIAL_PRICE, (SELECT SUB_NAME FROM MES_COMMON WHERE SUB_ID = pd.PO_STATUS AND MAIN_ID = 'STATUS') AS PO_STATUS FROM PO_DETAIL pd JOIN PURCHASE_ORDER p ON pd.PO_ID = p.PO_ID JOIN MATERIAL m ON pd.MATERIAL_ID = m.MATERIAL_ID WHERE pd.PO_ID = #{PO_ID} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(pd.PODETAIL_ID)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PO_DETAIL ( PODETAIL_ID, PO_ID, MATERIAL_ID, PO_COUNT, PO_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, CREATE_DATE, PO_STATUS ) SELECT SEQ_PODETAIL.NEXTVAL, po.PO_ID, #{MATERIAL_ID}, #{PO_COUNT}, m.MATERIAL_PRICE, (#{PO_COUNT} * m.MATERIAL_PRICE) * 1.1, CURRENT_DATE, #{PO_STATUS} FROM PURCHASE_ORDER po JOIN MATERIAL m ON m.MATERIAL_ID = #{MATERIAL_ID} WHERE po.PO_ID = #{poId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PO_DETAIL SET MATERIAL_ID = #{MATERIAL_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_COUNT = #{PO_COUNT}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{PO_COUNT} * PO_PRICE, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE, UPDATE_MEMBER = #{UPDATE_MEM}, PO_STATUS = #{PO_STATUS} WHERE PODETAIL_ID = #{PODETAIL_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
